idea-plugin.name: Generate unit test code
idea-plugin.description:
作用：自动生成单元测试的代码，提升研发效率 Function: Automatically generate unit test code to improve research and development efficiency.
用法：在要测试的代码中，右键 -> 选择【generate...】->【Auto Generation Test Code】-> 选择要测试的方法 -> 确定 Usage: In the code to be tested, right click -> select [generate...] -> [Auto Generation Test Code] -> select the method to be tested -> OK.
这个插件目前是在公司内部推广中 This plugin is promoting in the company.

action.description: Automatic Generation of Unit Test Code
